name: alien-module-tweaked
title: Alien Loot Economy Tweaked
author: Dendril (sensenmann)
description: This is a tweaked release of sensenmann's Alien Loot Economy; all credits are awarded to sensenmann. **I highly suggest you install the original mod instead**, since this was uploaded to distribute the tweaks to my friends for multiplayer. Link to the original is in the incompatible dependencies below.
